args.final_thought:
The `simpo_loss` function in the `SimPOTrainer` class has been implemented based on the description in the paper. The function now calculates rewards using average log probabilities and implements the Bradley-Terry objective with a target reward margin. The changes have been made directly to the specified Python file.

If you have any further questions or need additional modifications, feel free to ask!
